You've got free shipping", progress_msg_start: 'Only', progress_msg_end: ' away from free shipping', link_opt: 0 }; render() { const { name, goal, init_msg_start, init_msg_end, progress_msg_start, progress_msg_end, goal_msg, link_opt } = this.state; return ( Free Shipping Bar (FSB) Dashboard
